Uses of Class
org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes.Claim

  • Packages that use Claim 
    Package Description
    org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes  

    • Uses of Claim in org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes

      Subclasses of Claim in org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Connection
      A Connection node embodies directed relationships between two other claims.
      class  Grouping
      A Grouping embodies undirected relationships between two or more other claims.
      class  Match
      Each Thing node represents the claim a source might make that "something exists".
      class  Property
      A Property represents a single putative fact we might encounter or derive about some other claim.
      class  Thing
      Each Thing node represents the claim a source might make that "something exists".
      Fields in org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes declared as Claim 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      Claim Connection.from
      See main class description.
      Claim Property.subject
      The node to which the property applies.
      Claim Connection.to
      See main class description.
      Fields in org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes with type parameters of type Claim 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      java.util.Collection<Claim> Inference.antecedents
      The set of Claims that, taken together, support this inference.
      java.util.SortedSet<Claim> Grouping.subjects
      The set of nodes that all share the given relationship with one another.
      Methods in org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes with parameters of type Claim 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Node[] InferenceRule.consequentsOf(Claim... antecedents)
      Derives the consequences of applying this rule to the provided antecedents.
      static boolean InferenceRule.valueMatches(java.lang.Object value, java.lang.Object target, Claim... lookup)
      Compares a value found inside a Node to a target found inside an antecedent.
      Method parameters in org.rootsdev.polygenea.nodes with type arguments of type Claim

      Guesses at what rule was intended to get from a concrete set of antecedents to a concrete set of consequents.
